thread.title: Day trips from the Lehigh Valley

title: Day trips from the Lehigh Valley
text:
Day trips from the Lehigh Valley Contributed photo / HANDOUT Enjoy a holiday show in New York or at one of several other area theatres. Enjoy a holiday show in New York or at one of several other area theatres. (Contributed photo / HANDOUT) Enjoy a day trip and support a nonprofit organization. 
DAY TRIPPIN' 
•"The Crooners," American Music Theatre, May 18. $80. Assumption Church Travel Club, John, 610-767-3036. 
•Historic Mills Tour, Evans-Mumbower Mill, Newlin Grist Mill, Mill at Anselma, Oct. 21. $85. Mennonite Heritage Center, 215-256-3020. 
•Brigantine Birding Trip, Forsythe National Wildlife Refuge, N.J., Oct. 29. $24, nonmembers; $18, members. Monroe County Conservation District Environmental Education Center, 570-629-3061. 
•"Good Night Mrs. Puffin," Rainbow's Comedy Playhouse, Nov. 15. $81. Lehigh Township Lioness Club, Geraldine, 610-767-2384. 
•"A Tribute to Our Veterans," Villa Roma Resort, Callicoon, N.Y., Nov. 10. $88. St Anne's 55+ Club, 610-807-9906. 
•The Platters, Mt. Airy Resort, Dec. 8. $58. Operation Sunshine, 610-435-9155. 
•Christmas Spectacular, Radio City Music Hall, Dec. 2. $148. St. Joseph's Prime Time, Marty, 215-529-4570. 
•Caramoor Holiday Tea and Musicale, Katonah, N.Y., tours of Rosen House and John Jay Homestead, Dec. 4. $126. Allentown Art Museum, Ellie, 610-262-0682. 
•" The Crooners," American Music Theatre, May 18. $80. Assumption Church Travel Club, John, 610-767-3036. 
• Philadelphia Museum of Art and Barnes Museum, Nov. 1. $75. Deadline: Oct. 20. Mary Meuser Memorial Library, 610-258-3040. 
• Christmas Spectacular, Radio City, Dec. 13. $105; $115, nonresidents. Forks Township Community Center, 610-250-2260. 
•" Deck the Halls ," American Music Theater, Nov. 19. $90. Friends of the Southern Lehigh Public Library, Mary Ann, 610-282-2731. 
• Christmas Show, Sight & Sound, Dec. 2. $92. Christmas Show, Hunterdon Hills, Dec. 15. $88. Holy Family Golden Agers, Frank, 610-759-0576. 
• Vatican Splendors, Franklin Institute, Dec. 11. $65/$55. Friends of Northampton Area Public Library, 610-262-7537. 
• Zabar's, Rockefeller Center, Union Square Holiday Market, Trader Joe's, New York, Dec. 13. $35. Camp Serranova, Rosie, 610-966-3367. 
" Christmas Show," American Music Theater, Nov. 4. $90. Barbra Streisand/Frank Sinatra tribute, Mount Airy, Nov. 10. $58. Christmas Show, Hunterdon Hills, Dec. 16. $88. Allentown AARP Chapter 5415, Jeanne, 610-437-4265. 
• Miracle of Christmas, Sight & Sound, Nov. 19. $92. Christmas Show, American Music Theatre, Dec. 17. $81. New Years in the Afternoon, LiGreci, Dec. 31. $95. School Retirees, Joanne, 610-398-0981. 
• Christmas Spectacular, Radio City, Nov. 14. $125. Communities That Care Whitehall-Coplay Hunger Initiative, Rhonda, 610-266-1995. 
Vatican Splendors, Franklin Institute, Nov. 12. $100. St. Jane's Trips and Tours, Carol, 610-252-4233. 
• Christmas Show, American Music Theatre, Dec. 9. $88. St. Elizabeth of Hungary Golden Agers, Barbara, 610-266-2874. 
• Philly Pops holiday concert, Kimmel Center, Dec. 6. $155. Bethlehem Garden Club, Jacqueline, 610-867-7463. 
• "Christmas Show," American Music Theatre, Nov. 17. $90. MORA/Lighthouse Travelers, Roland, 610-703-1788. 
• Christmas Show, American Music Theatre, Dec. 10. $85. Notre Dame of Bethlehem 55+ Club, Joyce, 610-866-0360. 
•Broadway , choice of "Finding Neverland,""Something Rotten" or "Beautiful," Nov. 18. $150. Lehigh Valley Active Life, 610-437-3700. 
• "Miracle of Christmas," Sight & Sound, Dec. 2. $90. St. Ann's Church, Kay, 484-554-1864. 
• Christmas Show, American Music Theater, Nov. 28. $110. Pen Argyl Alumni Association, Bill, 610-863-6297. 
• "Impersonators: Frank Sinatra/Barbara Streisand," Mount Airy, Nov. 10. $60. "Christmas Show," American Music Theater, Dec. 9. $86.Walnutport Senior Citizens, Dianne, 610-767-5646. 
• Bavarian Christmas: Brownstone, Ace in the Hole, Dec. 8. $80. St. John Fisher Senior Citizens, Bill, 610-264-0920. 
OVERNIGHT TRIPS 
•Springtime in Norfolk, Azalea Festival, Naval Station, Victory Rover Boat Tour, MacArthur Memorial& Mall, International Tattoo, and more, April 21-24. $760. St. Jane's Trips & Tours, Carol, 610-252-4233. 
•Seneca Lake, N.Y., 12 wineries, two continental breakfasts, two lunches, one dinner, May 20-22. $410. Chestnut Hill Church, Debbie, 610-967-1975. 
•Canyon Country Tour, May 23-31. $3,079. Bethlehem YMCA, Gillian, 610-691-7305. 
•Norfolk Azalea Festival, Spirit of Norfolk dinner cruise, Virginia International Tattoo Show, Norfolk Naval base tour, Norfolk Botanical Gardens tour, more, April 21-24. $540. St. Joseph's Prime Time, Florence, 610-797-5452. 
•Southern Caribbean Cruise, six ports, Jan. 17-29. Starting at $1,419. Lower Macungie Seniors, Doris, 610-966-3653. 
• San Antonio, Mission San Jose, the Alamo, LBJ Ranch, Mayan Dude Ranch, May 22-26. $1,819. British Landscapes, England, Scotland, Wales, Edingurgh Castle, Stonehenge, Sept. 3-12. $3,899. School Retirees, Joanne, 610-398-0981. 
• Branson at the Beach, Ocean City, Md., March 21-24. Five shows, three dinners, three breakfasts, more. MORA/Lighthouse Travelers, Roland, 610-703-1788. 
•Pacific Northwest and California, May 29-June 5. $2,999. Assumption Church Travel Club, John, 610-767-3036. 
• Italy, Venice, Padua, Florence, Assisi, Rome, March 29-April 7. $3,890. Most Blessed Sacrament Church, 610-845-2460. 
Sponsored Trips are for nonprofit organizations. Send information two weeks in advance: event, date, cost, phone number. Fax: 610-820-6693; email: news@mcall.com ; mail: Trips, The Morning Call, Box 1260, Allentown, 18105-1260.
